CVE-2024-8996
(7.3 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T18:32:47

2 posts

Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in Grafana Agent (Flow mode) on Windows allows Privilege Escalation from Local User to SYSTEM This issue affects Agent Flow: before 0.43.2

##

CVE-2024-4278
(5.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.00%

updated 2024-09-26T18:32:47

2 posts

An information disclosure issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions starting from 16.5 prior to 17.2.8, from 17.3 prior to 17.3.4, and from 17.4 prior to 17.4.1. A maintainer could obtain a Dependency Proxy password by editing a certain Dependency Proxy setting.

screaminggoat at 2024-09-25T20:36:04.213Z ##

GitLab security advisory: GitLab Patch Release: 17.4.1, 17.3.4, 17.2.8

  • CVE-2024-4278 (5.5 medium) Maintainer can leak Dependency Proxy password by changing Dependency Proxy URL via crafted POST request
  • CVE-2024-4099 (3.1 low) AI feature reads unsanitized content, allowing for attacker to hide prompt injection
  • CVE-2024-8974 (2.6 low) Project reference can be exposed in system notes

No mention of exploitation

#GitLab #vulnerability #CVE

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-25T20:36:04.000Z ##

GitLab security advisory: GitLab Patch Release: 17.4.1, 17.3.4, 17.2.8

  • CVE-2024-4278 (5.5 medium) Maintainer can leak Dependency Proxy password by changing Dependency Proxy URL via crafted POST request
  • CVE-2024-4099 (3.1 low) AI feature reads unsanitized content, allowing for attacker to hide prompt injection
  • CVE-2024-8974 (2.6 low) Project reference can be exposed in system notes

No mention of exploitation

#GitLab #vulnerability #CVE

##

CVE-2024-47085
(6.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T18:31:44

4 posts

CVE-2024-45489
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T13:32:55.343000

27 posts

Arc before 2024-08-26 allows remote code execution in JavaScript boosts. Boosts that run JavaScript cannot be shared by default; however (because of misconfigured Firebase ACLs), it is possible to create or update a boost using another user's ID. This installs the boost in the victim's browser and runs arbitrary Javascript on that browser in a privileged context. NOTE: this is a no-action cloud vu

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-21T23:34:41.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-45489 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-45489/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_45489

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-21T18:16:27.188Z ##

Arc: CVE-2024-45489 Incident Report
The cofounder and CTO of Arc gives a personal blog post/advisory for CVE-2024-45489 (9.8 critical, published 20 September 2024) RCE in Arc. See zxy3va's blog post disclosing CVE-2024-45489 in the parent toot above.

Arc before 2024-08-26 allows remote code execution in JavaScript boosts. Boosts that run JavaScript cannot be shared by default; however (because of misconfigured Firebase ACLs), it is possible to create or update a boost using another user's ID. This installs the boost in the victim's browser and runs arbitrary Javascript on that browser in a privileged context. NOTE: this is a no-action cloud vulnerability with zero affected users.

This post is a longform version of the mitre description above. I started to summarize it and felt like it wasn't necessary if I just quoted the description in its entirety. Arc is making a number of changes to avoid this moving forward and to improve their communication around security vulnerabilities.

cc: @todb

#CVE_2024_45489 #arc #arcbrowser #cloudvulnerability #vulnerability #CVE

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-20T15:42:00.931Z ##

trending on the Bad Place: xyzeva: gaining access to anyones browser without them even visiting a website
Arc is apparently a freeware browser. The problem: CVE-2024-45489 (unknown, supposedly assigned 06 September 2024) allows malicious users to rewrite content shown to other users when they open a page. The attack chain consists of the following steps:

  • obtain the user id of the victim via user referrals, published boosts, or user easels
  • create a malicious boost with a custom payload on one's own account
  • update the boost creatorID field to the targets
  • whenever the victim visits the targeted website, they will get compromised

This was fixed within 1 day of reporting, and assigned a CVE 11 days later, but the information still isn't public. xyzeva also notes potential remote code execution possibilities, and voices privacy concerns.

#arc #browser #vulnerability #CVE_2024_45489 #cve

##
RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-21T23:34:41.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-45489 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-45489/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_45489

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-21T18:16:27.000Z ##

Arc: CVE-2024-45489 Incident Report
The cofounder and CTO of Arc gives a personal blog post/advisory for CVE-2024-45489 (9.8 critical, published 20 September 2024) RCE in Arc. See zxy3va's blog post disclosing CVE-2024-45489 in the parent toot above.

Arc before 2024-08-26 allows remote code execution in JavaScript boosts. Boosts that run JavaScript cannot be shared by default; however (because of misconfigured Firebase ACLs), it is possible to create or update a boost using another user's ID. This installs the boost in the victim's browser and runs arbitrary Javascript on that browser in a privileged context. NOTE: this is a no-action cloud vulnerability with zero affected users.

This post is a longform version of the mitre description above. I started to summarize it and felt like it wasn't necessary if I just quoted the description in its entirety. Arc is making a number of changes to avoid this moving forward and to improve their communication around security vulnerabilities.

cc: @todb

#CVE_2024_45489 #arc #arcbrowser #cloudvulnerability #vulnerability #CVE

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-20T15:42:00.000Z ##

trending on the Bad Place: xyzeva: gaining access to anyones browser without them even visiting a website
Arc is apparently a freeware browser. The problem: CVE-2024-45489 (unknown, supposedly assigned 06 September 2024) allows malicious users to rewrite content shown to other users when they open a page. The attack chain consists of the following steps:

  • obtain the user id of the victim via user referrals, published boosts, or user easels
  • create a malicious boost with a custom payload on one's own account
  • update the boost creatorID field to the targets
  • whenever the victim visits the targeted website, they will get compromised

This was fixed within 1 day of reporting, and assigned a CVE 11 days later, but the information still isn't public. xyzeva also notes potential remote code execution possibilities, and voices privacy concerns.

#arc #browser #vulnerability #CVE_2024_45489 #cve

rmateu@social.lol at 2024-09-23T22:21:40.000Z ##

##
b30@wandzeitung.xyz at 2024-09-23T17:50:22.000Z ##

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-23T16:16:59.628Z ##

##
avoidthehack at 2024-09-23T14:40:56.440Z ##

Researcher reveals ‘catastrophic’ #security flaw in the Arc browser

(CVE-2024-45489)

The Arc Browser is a fork of #chromium with a lot of built-in features and integrations... and requires an account to use.

Arc Browser uses Firebase to store user information for features like Arc Boosts. Arc Boosts can contain arbitrary javascript... with knowing the CreatorID, an attacker could inject code into other users' browsing sessions.

Crazy to me because this implementation appeared to rely solely on user-provided identities (the CreatorID) without implementing any checks.

They've fixed the issue and are apparently implementing mitigations + moving off Firebase for "future features."

#browsers #cybersecurity #cve

https://www.theverge.com/2024/9/20/24249919/arc-browser-boost-firebase-vulnerability-patched

##
technotenshi at 2024-09-20T17:16:32.205Z ##

A vulnerability (CVE-2024-45489) in the Arc browser allowed attackers to gain access to users' browsers without visiting a malicious website. The flaw stemmed from insecure Firebase Firestore rules, enabling arbitrary changes to user-generated "boosts" (custom scripts for websites). Attackers could modify boosts to execute on a victim's browser by changing creator IDs. Arc has since patched the issue and plans to move away from Firebase.

https://kibty.town/blog/arc/

#infosec #CVE #cybersecurity #Firebase

##
AAKL at 2024-09-20T16:29:41.149Z ##

CVE-2024-45489: Gaining access to anyone's browser without them even visiting a website https://kibty.town/blog/arc/

"An exploit patched last month could have allowed attackers to access anyone’s browser just by knowing their user ID."

Researcher reveals ‘catastrophic’ security flaw in the #Arc browser https://www.theverge.com/2024/9/20/24249919/arc-browser-boost-firebase-vulnerability-patched @verge

Arc statement: CVE-2024-45489 Incident Response https://arc.net/blog/CVE-2024-45489-incident-response #cybersecurity #Infosec

(CVE-2024-45489)

The Arc Browser is a fork of #chromium with a lot of built-in features and integrations... and requires an account to use.

Arc Browser uses Firebase to store user information for features like Arc Boosts. Arc Boosts can contain arbitrary javascript... with knowing the CreatorID, an attacker could inject code into other users' browsing sessions.

A vulnerability (CVE-2024-45489) in the Arc browser allowed attackers to gain access to users' browsers without visiting a malicious website. The flaw stemmed from insecure Firebase Firestore rules, enabling arbitrary changes to user-generated "boosts" (custom scripts for websites). Attackers could modify boosts to execute on a victim's browser by changing creator IDs. Arc has since patched the issue and plans to move away from Firebase.

##

CVE-2024-45229
(6.6 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T13:32:55.343000

22 posts

The Versa Director offers REST APIs for orchestration and management. By design, certain APIs, such as the login screen, banner display, and device registration, do not require authentication. However, it was discovered that for Directors directly connected to the Internet, one of these APIs can be exploited by injecting invalid arguments into a GET request, potentially exposing the authentication

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-21T23:33:41.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-45229 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-45229/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_45229

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-20T21:55:27.525Z ##

CISA: Versa Networks Releases Advisory for a Vulnerability in Versa Director, CVE-2024-45229
CVE-2024-45229 (6.6 medium, disclosed today) sensitive information disclosure? in Versa Director, see security advisory

The Versa Director offers REST APIs for orchestration and management. By design, certain APIs, such as the login screen, banner display, and device registration, do not require authentication. However, it was discovered that for Directors directly connected to the Internet, one of these APIs can be exploited by injecting invalid arguments into a GET request, potentially exposing the authentication tokens of other currently logged-in users. These tokens can then be used to invoke additional APIs on port 9183. This exploit does not disclose any username or password information.

Versa Networks is not aware of this exploitation in any production systems. A proof of concept exists in the lab environment.

While this is not as serious as it appears, it's an alert from CISA after business hours on a Friday night. Last time, CISA added a fucking Versa Director vulnerability to the KEV Catalog after business hours on a Friday night. Then we come to find out that the Chinese state-sponsored APT Volt Typhoon was exploiting it as a zero-day.

#CVE_2024_45229 #VersaDirector #vulnerability #CVE

##
RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-21T23:33:41.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-45229 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-45229/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_45229

CISA: Versa Networks Releases Advisory for a Vulnerability in Versa Director, CVE-2024-45229
CVE-2024-45229 (6.6 medium, disclosed today) sensitive information disclosure? in Versa Director, see security advisory

The Versa Director offers REST APIs for orchestration and management. By design, certain APIs, such as the login screen, banner display, and device registration, do not require authentication. However, it was discovered that for Directors directly connected to the Internet, one of these APIs can be exploited by injecting invalid arguments into a GET request, potentially exposing the authentication tokens of other currently logged-in users. These tokens can then be used to invoke additional APIs on port 9183. This exploit does not disclose any username or password information.

Versa Networks is not aware of this exploitation in any production systems. A proof of concept exists in the lab environment.

CVE-2024-6785
(5.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T13:32:55.343000

4 posts

The configuration file stores credentials in cleartext. An attacker with local access rights can read or modify the configuration file, potentially resulting in the service being abused due to sensitive information exposure.

CVE-2024-6786
(6.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T13:32:55.343000

4 posts

The vulnerability allows an attacker to craft MQTT messages that include relative path traversal sequences, enabling them to read arbitrary files on the system. This could lead to the disclosure of sensitive information, such as configuration files and JWT signing secrets.

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-22T04:49:25.000Z ##

CVE-2024-6787
(5.3 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T13:32:55.343000

4 posts

This vulnerability occurs when an attacker exploits a race condition between the time a file is checked and the time it is used (TOCTOU). By exploiting this race condition, an attacker can write arbitrary files to the system. This could allow the attacker to execute malicious code and potentially cause file losses.

screaminggoat at 2024-09-25T16:31:31.295Z ##

Happy #PatchTuesday (on a Wednesday) from Cisco as they drop 15 new security advisories:

  • Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20437 (8.1 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Routers Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20455 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Resource Reservation Protocol Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20433 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software Protocol Independent Multicast Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20464 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software SD-Access Fabric Edge Node Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20480 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software HTTP Server Telephony Services Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20436 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst Center Static SSH Host Key Vulnerability CVE-2024-20350 (7.5 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software IPv4 Fragmentation Reassembly Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20467 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst 9000 Series Switches Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20434 (4.3 medium)
  • Cisco Unified Threat Defense Snort Intrusion Prevention System Engine for Cisco IOS XE Software Security Policy Bypass and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20508 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Manager Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability CVE-2024-20475 (6.4 medium)
  • Cisco SD-WAN vEdge Software UDP Packet Validation Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20496 (6.1 medium)
  • Cisco IOS Software on Cisco Industrial Ethernet Series Switches Access Control List Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20465 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

#Cisco #vulnerability #CVE

  • Cisco IOS XE Software Protocol Independent Multicast Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20464 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software SD-Access Fabric Edge Node Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20480 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software HTTP Server Telephony Services Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20436 (8.6 high)

  • Cisco Unified Threat Defense Snort Intrusion Prevention System Engine for Cisco IOS XE Software Security Policy Bypass and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20508 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Manager Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability CVE-2024-20475 (6.4 medium)
  • Cisco SD-WAN vEdge Software UDP Packet Validation Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20496 (6.1 medium)
  • Cisco IOS Software on Cisco Industrial Ethernet Series Switches Access Control List Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20465 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

#Cisco #vulnerability #CVE

Happy #PatchTuesday (on a Wednesday) from Cisco as they drop 15 new security advisories:

  • Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20437 (8.1 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Routers Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20455 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Resource Reservation Protocol Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20433 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software Protocol Independent Multicast Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20464 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software SD-Access Fabric Edge Node Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20480 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software HTTP Server Telephony Services Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20436 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst Center Static SSH Host Key Vulnerability CVE-2024-20350 (7.5 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software IPv4 Fragmentation Reassembly Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20467 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst 9000 Series Switches Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20434 (4.3 medium)
  • Cisco Unified Threat Defense Snort Intrusion Prevention System Engine for Cisco IOS XE Software Security Policy Bypass and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20508 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Manager Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability CVE-2024-20475 (6.4 medium)
  • Cisco SD-WAN vEdge Software UDP Packet Validation Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20496 (6.1 medium)
  • Cisco IOS Software on Cisco Industrial Ethernet Series Switches Access Control List Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20465 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

CVE-2024-20464
(8.6 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-26T13:32:02.803000

6 posts

A vulnerability in the Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) feature of Cisco IOS XE Software could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of received IPv4 PIMv2 packets. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted PIMv2 packet to a PIM-enabled interfa

  • Cisco IOS XE Software IPv4 Fragmentation Reassembly Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20467 (8.6 high)

  • Cisco Unified Threat Defense Snort Intrusion Prevention System Engine for Cisco IOS XE Software Security Policy Bypass and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20508 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Manager Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability CVE-2024-20475 (6.4 medium)
  • Cisco SD-WAN vEdge Software UDP Packet Validation Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20496 (6.1 medium)
  • Cisco IOS Software on Cisco Industrial Ethernet Series Switches Access Control List Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20465 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

#Cisco #vulnerability #CVE

CVE-2024-8897
(6.1 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-25T21:31:40

2 posts

Under certain conditions, an attacker with the ability to redirect users to a malicious site via an open redirect on a trusted site, may be able to spoof the address bar contents. This can lead to a malicious site to appear to have the same URL as the trusted site. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android

screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T13:39:17.615Z ##

Security Vulnerabilities fixed in Firefox for Android 130.0.1
CVE-2024-8897 (high severity) Address bar spoofing after server-side redirect
This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.
No mention of exploitation

updated 2024-09-25T19:30:16

2 posts

### Impact Multipart file upload support as defined in the [GraphQL multipart request specification](https://github.com/jaydenseric/graphql-multipart-request-spec) was enabled by default in all Strawberry HTTP view integrations. This made all Strawberry HTTP view integrations vulnerable to CSRF attacks if users did not explicitly enable CSRF preventing security mechanism for their servers. Additi

1 repos

#search_error

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-26T04:39:22.000Z ##

CVE Alert: CVE-2024-47082 - https://www.redpacketsecurity.com/cve_alert_cve-2024-47082/

#OSINT #ThreatIntel #CyberSecurity #cve_2024_47082

RedPacketSecurity@mastodon.social at 2024-09-26T04:39:22.000Z ##

CVE-2024-45410
(7.5 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-25T19:29:56

4 posts

### Impact There is a vulnerability in Traefik that allows the client to remove the X-Forwarded headers (except the header X-Forwarded-For). ### Patches - https://github.com/traefik/traefik/releases/tag/v2.11.9 - https://github.com/traefik/traefik/releases/tag/v3.1.3 ### Workarounds No workaround. ### For more information If you have any questions or comments about this advisory, please [op

1 repos

https://github.com/jphetphoumy/traefik-CVE-2024-45410-poc

mttaggart@infosec.town at 2024-09-24T14:09:52.378Z ##

A gnarly, but perhaps a bit overscored, vuln in Traefik:

Basically the issue is that stripping/replacing headers puts those headers in control of the attacker, but RCE would depend on what the application behind Traefik does with them. Still very bad, but not an insta-win.

#CVE_2024_45410 #ThreatIntel

www.cert.europa.eu/publications/security-advisories/2024-102/

CVE-2024-9122
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T18:32:27

2 posts

Type Confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 129.0.6668.70 allowed a remote attacker to perform out of bounds memory access via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

screaminggoat at 2024-09-24T18:16:54.124Z ##

Google security advisory: Stable Channel Update for Desktop
New Google Chrome version 129.0.6668.70/.71 for Windows, Mac and 129.0.6668.70 for Linux. Five security fixes, 4 externally reported:

  • CVE-2024-9120 (high) Use after free in Dawn
  • CVE-2024-9121 (high) Inappropriate implementation in V8
  • CVE-2024-9122 (high) Type Confusion in V8
  • CVE-2024-9123 (high) Integer overflow in Skia

No mention of exploitation. Excelsior!

#google #chrome #chromium #patchtuesday #vulnerability #CVE

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-25T16:31:31.295Z ##

Happy #PatchTuesday (on a Wednesday) from Cisco as they drop 15 new security advisories:

  • Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20437 (8.1 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Routers Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20455 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Resource Reservation Protocol Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20433 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software Protocol Independent Multicast Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20464 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software SD-Access Fabric Edge Node Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20480 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software HTTP Server Telephony Services Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20436 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst Center Static SSH Host Key Vulnerability CVE-2024-20350 (7.5 high)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software IPv4 Fragmentation Reassembly Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20467 (8.6 high)
  • Cisco Catalyst 9000 Series Switches Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20434 (4.3 medium)
  • Cisco Unified Threat Defense Snort Intrusion Prevention System Engine for Cisco IOS XE Software Security Policy Bypass and Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20508 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Manager Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability CVE-2024-20475 (6.4 medium)
  • Cisco SD-WAN vEdge Software UDP Packet Validation Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20496 (6.1 medium)
  • Cisco IOS Software on Cisco Industrial Ethernet Series Switches Access Control List Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20465 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

#Cisco #vulnerability #CVE

  • Cisco IOS XE Software Protocol Independent Multicast Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20464 (8.6 high)

  • Cisco SD-WAN vEdge Software UDP Packet Validation Denial of Service Vulnerability CVE-2024-20496 (6.1 medium)
  • Cisco IOS Software on Cisco Industrial Ethernet Series Switches Access Control List Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20465 (5.8 medium)
  • Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software Web UI Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability CVE-2024-20414 (6.5 medium)
  • Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless Controllers CWA Pre-Authentication ACL Bypass Vulnerability CVE-2024-20510 (4.7 medium)

You can have an updated security advisory, as a treat: Multiple Cisco Products Web-Based Management Interface Privilege Escalation Vulnerability CVE-2024-20381 (8.8 high, disclosed 11 September 2024) was updated for "Clarified affected products and vulnerable configuration."

The Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT) is not aware of any public announcements or malicious use of the vulnerability that is described in these advisories.

#Cisco #vulnerability #CVE

CVE-2022-21445
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 7.31%

updated 2024-09-25T15:31:10

4 posts

Vulnerability in the Oracle JDeveloper product of Oracle Fusion Middleware (component: ADF Faces). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.1.3.0 and 12.2.1.4.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle JDeveloper. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle JDeveloper. CVSS 3.1 Base Score

Vendor: Oracle
Product: JDeveloper
Date Added: 2024-09-18
Vulnerability: Oracle JDeveloper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

CVE URL: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-21445

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-18T14:09:44.925Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds Five Known Vulnerabilities to Catalog
This is so hot off the press that CISA's press team hasn't created the page yet. 5 are being added to the KEV:

  • CVE-2020-14644 (9.8 critical) Oracle WebLogic Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2022-21445 (9.8 critical) Oracle JDeveloper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2019-1069 (7.8 high) Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
  • CVE-2020-0618 (8.8 high) Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-27348 (9.8 critical) Apache HugeGraph-Server Improper Access Control Vulnerability

#Cisa #KEV #vulnerability #knownexploitedvulnerabilitiescatalog #CVE #eitw #activeexploitation

##

CVE-2024-45817(CVSS UNKNOWN)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T12:30:46

2 posts

In x86's APIC (Advanced Programmable Interrupt Controller) architecture, error conditions are reported in a status register. Furthermore, the OS can opt to receive an interrupt when a new error occurs. It is possible to configure the error interrupt with an illegal vector, which generates an error when an error interrupt is raised. This case causes Xen to recurse through vlapic_error(). The re

screaminggoat at 2024-09-25T16:12:56.029Z ##

Citrix security advisory: XenServer and Citrix Hypervisor Security Update for CVE-2024-45817

  • CVE-2024-45817 (score pending, disclosed today) affects both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR: a malicious administrator of a guest VM can cause the host to crash or become unresponsive.
  • CVE-2022-24805 (6.5 medium) net-snmp: A buffer overflow in the handling of the INDEX of NET-SNMP-VACM-MIB can cause an out-of-bounds memory access. affects XenServer 8
  • CVE-2022-24809 (6.5 medium) net-snmp: A malformed OID in a SET request to NET-SNMP-AGENT-MIB::nsLogTable can cause a NULL pointer dereference. Affects XenServer 8

No mention of exploitation. See CISA cybersecurity advisory: Citrix Releases Security Updates for XenServer and Citrix Hypervisor

#Citrix #vulnerability #CVE #CVE_2024_45817 #CVE_2022_24805 #CVE_2022_24809

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-25T16:12:56.000Z ##

Citrix security advisory: XenServer and Citrix Hypervisor Security Update for CVE-2024-45817

  • CVE-2024-45817 (score pending, disclosed today) affects both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR: a malicious administrator of a guest VM can cause the host to crash or become unresponsive.
  • CVE-2022-24805 (6.5 medium) net-snmp: A buffer overflow in the handling of the INDEX of NET-SNMP-VACM-MIB can cause an out-of-bounds memory access. affects XenServer 8
  • CVE-2022-24809 (6.5 medium) net-snmp: A malformed OID in a SET request to NET-SNMP-AGENT-MIB::nsLogTable can cause a NULL pointer dereference. Affects XenServer 8

No mention of exploitation. See CISA cybersecurity advisory: Citrix Releases Security Updates for XenServer and Citrix Hypervisor

(9.1 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.06%

updated 2024-09-25T06:30:48

2 posts

The WordPress Simple HTML Sitemap plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the 'id' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.1 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Administrator-level access and above, to append additional SQL querie

##

CVE-2024-20017
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T03:31:40

9 posts

In wlan service, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation Patch ID: WCNCR00350938; Issue ID: MSV-1132.

1 repos

#search_error

decio at 2024-09-21T10:00:13.337Z ##

#cve_2024_20017 recap
⬇️
"Affected chipsets: MT6890, MT7915, MT7916, MT7981, MT7986, MT7622
⬇️
Affected software: SDK version 7.4.0.1 and before (for MT7915) / SDK version 7.6.7.0 and before (for MT7916, MT7981 and MT7986)"
⬇️
""4 exploits, 1 bug: exploiting cve-2024-20017 4 different ways"
👇
https://blog.coffinsec.com/0day/2024/08/30/exploiting-CVE-2024-20017-four-different-ways.html
⬇️
[PoC]
👇
https://github.com/mellow-hype/cve-2024-20017/tree/main
⬇️
"Critical Exploit in MediaTek Wi-Fi Chipsets: Zero-Click Vulnerability (CVE-2024-20017) Threatens Routers and Smartphones"
👇
https://blog.sonicwall.com/en-us/2024/09/critical-exploit-in-mediatek-wi-fi-chipsets-zero-click-vulnerability-cve-2024-20017-threatens-routers-and-smartphones/

[#Mediatek advisory]

"In wlan service, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation"
⬇️
"March 2024 Product Security Bulletin"
👇
https://corp.mediatek.com/product-security-bulletin/March-2024

[#Ubiquity statement]

"Ubiquiti is NOT affected. We don't have any product that uses the vulnerable code."
👇

CVE-2024-8350
(2.7 LOW)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T03:30:48

2 posts

The Uncanny Groups for LearnDash plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to user group add due to a missing capability check on the /wp-json/ulgm_management/v1/add_user/ REST API endpoint in all versions up to, and including, 6.1.0.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with group leader-level access and above, to add users to their group which ultimately allows them to leverage CVE-202

1 repos

https://github.com/karlemilnikka/CVE-2024-8349-and-CVE-2024-8350

karlemilnikka@social.nikkasystems.com at 2024-09-17T14:21:20.000Z ##

WordPress site-owners running Uncanny Groups for LearnDash, please make sure you’ve updated to version 6.1.1, released 2024-09-11. With previous versions, group leaders can make themselves admins on your site.

https://github.com/karlemilnikka/CVE-2024-8349-and-CVE-2024-8350

CVE-2024-9123
(7.1 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T03:30:47

2 posts

Integer overflow in Skia in Google Chrome prior to 129.0.6668.70 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

screaminggoat at 2024-09-24T18:16:54.124Z ##

Google security advisory: Stable Channel Update for Desktop
New Google Chrome version 129.0.6668.70/.71 for Windows, Mac and 129.0.6668.70 for Linux. Five security fixes, 4 externally reported:

  • CVE-2024-9120 (high) Use after free in Dawn
  • CVE-2024-9121 (high) Inappropriate implementation in V8
  • CVE-2024-9122 (high) Type Confusion in V8
  • CVE-2024-9123 (high) Integer overflow in Skia

No mention of exploitation. Excelsior!

#google #chrome #chromium #patchtuesday #vulnerability #CVE

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-24T18:16:54.000Z ##

New Google Chrome version 129.0.6668.70/.71 for Windows, Mac and 129.0.6668.70 for Linux. Five security fixes, 4 externally reported:

  • CVE-2024-9121 (high) Inappropriate implementation in V8
  • CVE-2024-9122 (high) Type Confusion in V8
  • CVE-2024-9123 (high) Integer overflow in Skia

CVE-2024-42505
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T03:30:43

3 posts

Command injection vulnerabilities in the underlying CLI service could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by sending specially crafted packets destined to the PAPI (Aruba's Access Point management protocol) UDP port (8211). Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities results in the ability to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.

jbhall56 at 2024-09-26T12:30:38.441Z ##

The vulnerabilities (CVE-2024-42505, CVE-2024-42506, and CVE-2024-42507) can be exploited by sending specially crafted packets to the PAPI (Aruba’s Access Point management protocol) UDP port (8211) to get privileged access to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable devices. https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hpe-aruba-networking-fixes-three-critical-rce-flaws-impacting-its-access-points/

##
patchnow24x7 at 2024-09-25T04:33:25.649Z ##

CVE-2024-42259
(5.5 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-25T03:30:36

2 posts

In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: drm/i915/gem: Fix Virtual Memory mapping boundaries calculation Calculating the size of the mapped area as the lesser value between the requested size and the actual size does not consider the partial mapping offset. This can cause page fault access. Fix the calculation of the starting and ending addresses, the total size is no

1 repos

#search_error

jann at 2024-09-23T15:01:25.837Z ##

back in 2013, @sima published a i915/GEM Crashcourse explaining the Linux kernel i915 GPU driver; I read that earlier this year, and it was really helpful for understanding what is going on in the i915 code and understanding the context of CVE-2024-42259.

I think without that explainer, it would have taken me a long time to understand what GTT MMIO mappings are. The idea that some physical address region owned by the GPU proxies physical memory accesses based on GPU page tables is pretty mindblowing...

##
jann@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-23T15:01:25.000Z ##

back in 2013, @sima published a i915/GEM Crashcourse explaining the Linux kernel i915 GPU driver; I read that earlier this year, and it was really helpful for understanding what is going on in the i915 code and understanding the context of CVE-2024-42259.

I think without that explainer, it would have taken me a long time to understand what GTT MMIO mappings are. The idea that some physical address region owned by the GPU proxies physical memory accesses based on GPU page tables is pretty mindblowing...

CVE-2024-8907
(6.1 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-23T18:31:38

2 posts

Insufficient data validation in Omnibox in Google Chrome on Android prior to 129.0.6668.58 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UI gestures to inject arbitrary scripts or HTML (XSS) via a crafted set of UI gestures. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T22:02:54.285Z ##

Google Chrome security advisory: Stable Channel Update for Desktop
Chrome 129.0.6668.58 (Linux) and 129.0.6668.58/.59 (Windows and Mac) has 9 security fixes, 6 externally reported.

  1. CVE-2024-8904 (high) Type Confusion in V8.
  2. CVE-2024-8905 (medium) Inappropriate implementation in V8
  3. CVE-2024-8906 (medium) Incorrect security UI in Downloads
  4. CVE-2024-8907 (medium) Insufficient data validation in Omnibox
  5. CVE-2024-8908 (low) Inappropriate implementation in Autofill
  6. CVE-2024-8909 (low) Inappropriate implementation in UI

No mention of exploitation. A mini #PatchTuesday today after seeing VMware and GitLab.

#Google #Chrome #vulnerability #CVE

  3. CVE-2024-8906 (medium) Incorrect security UI in Downloads
  4. CVE-2024-8907 (medium) Insufficient data validation in Omnibox
  5. CVE-2024-8908 (low) Inappropriate implementation in Autofill
  6. CVE-2024-8909 (low) Inappropriate implementation in UI

No mention of exploitation. A mini #PatchTuesday today after seeing VMware and GitLab.

#Google #Chrome #vulnerability #CVE

##

CVE-2024-8908
(4.3 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-23T18:31:37

2 posts

Inappropriate implementation in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to 129.0.6668.58 allowed a remote attacker to perform UI spoofing via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T22:02:54.285Z ##

Google Chrome security advisory: Stable Channel Update for Desktop
Chrome 129.0.6668.58 (Linux) and 129.0.6668.58/.59 (Windows and Mac) has 9 security fixes, 6 externally reported.

  1. CVE-2024-8904 (high) Type Confusion in V8.
  2. CVE-2024-8905 (medium) Inappropriate implementation in V8
  3. CVE-2024-8906 (medium) Incorrect security UI in Downloads
  4. CVE-2024-8907 (medium) Insufficient data validation in Omnibox
  5. CVE-2024-8908 (low) Inappropriate implementation in Autofill
  6. CVE-2024-8909 (low) Inappropriate implementation in UI

No mention of exploitation. A mini #PatchTuesday today after seeing VMware and GitLab.

#Google #Chrome #vulnerability #CVE

CVE-2024-45409
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.09%

updated 2024-09-20T14:13:10.700000

13 posts

The Ruby SAML library is for implementing the client side of a SAML authorization. Ruby-SAML in <= 12.2 and 1.13.0 <= 1.16.0 does not properly verify the signature of the SAML Response. An unauthenticated attacker with access to any signed saml document (by the IdP) can thus forge a SAML Response/Assertion with arbitrary contents. This would allow the attacker to log in as arbitrary user within th

jos1264@social.skynetcloud.site at 2024-09-20T11:15:02.000Z ##

GitLab Urges Organizations To Patch For Authentication Bypass Vulnerability https://cybersecuritynews.com/gitlab-authentication-bypass-vulnerability/ #AuthenticationBypass #GitLabVulnerability #CyberSecurityNews #cybersecuritynews #SecurityUpdates #Vulnerability #CVE202445409

##
iaintshootinmis@digitaldarkage.cc at 2024-09-17T22:06:59.000Z ##

GitLab instances are inheriting the Ruby SAML Auth vuln #CVE202445409 that allows threat actors to forge SAML Assertions. #GitLab drops emergency updates for this CVSS 10/10.

Note that IdP SSO having MFA does NOT protect against this attack. Patching or MFA on the Instance is required.

https://about.gitlab.com/releases/2024/09/17/patch-release-gitlab-17-3-3-released/

#ThreatIntel and #ThreatHunting examples are included at the link

##

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T19:29:42.354Z ##

GitLab security advisory: GitLab Critical Patch Release: 17.3.3, 17.2.7, 17.1.8, 17.0.8, 16.11.10
CVE-2024-45409 (perfect 10.0 critical 🥳 cc: @cR0w) SAML authentication bypass

GitLab doing me a heccin' concern because they're already talking about detecting unsuccessful and successful exploitation attempts. I can't definitively say if exploitation in the wild occurred based on the verbiage in this advisory.

cc: @campuscodi @goatyell @da_667

#CVE_2024_45409 #GitLab #vulnerability #CVE

CVE-2024-8853
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.06%

updated 2024-09-20T09:30:42

4 posts

The Webo-facto plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in versions up to, and including, 1.40 due to insufficient restriction on the 'doSsoAuthentification' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to make themselves administrators by registering with a username that contains '-wfuser'.

CVE-2024-45698
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.08%

updated 2024-09-20T00:32:38

2 posts

Certain models of D-Link wireless routers do not properly validate user input in the telnet service, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to use hard-coded credentials to log into telnet and inject arbitrary OS commands, which can then be executed on the device.

1 repos

#search_error

verbrecher@mastodon.social at 2024-09-16T20:36:48.000Z ##

New:

🚨 CVSS 9.8 for D-Link WiFi Routers: Update Your Firmware Immediately

🛡️ Critical vulnerabilities have been discovered in several D-Link router models, potentially exposing millions of users to major security risks. TWCERT/CC, Taiwan's cybersecurity agency, urges all users to update their firmware without delay to avoid remote control of their devices.

Vulns:

CVE-2024-45694 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45698 (CVSS 8.8)
CVE-2024-45697 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45695 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45696 (CVSS 8.8)

##
verbrecher@mastodon.social at 2024-09-16T20:36:48.000Z ##

New:

🚨 CVSS 9.8 for D-Link WiFi Routers: Update Your Firmware Immediately

🛡️ Critical vulnerabilities have been discovered in several D-Link router models, potentially exposing millions of users to major security risks. TWCERT/CC, Taiwan's cybersecurity agency, urges all users to update their firmware without delay to avoid remote control of their devices.

Vulns:

CVE-2024-45694 (CVSS 9.8)

(9.4 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 30.99%

updated 2024-09-19T18:30:58

12 posts

Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

patchnow24x7 at 2024-09-20T05:19:34.237Z ##

CVE-2024-8963 :: CVSS Score: 9.4 :: Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance (CSA) addresses a #ZeroDay Path Transversal vulnerability..#PatchNOW

Advisory:
https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-Ivanti-CSA-4-6-Cloud-Services-Appliance-CVE-2024-8963?language=en_US

CSA 4.6 Patch 519: https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/CSA-4-6-Patch-519
CSA 5.0: https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/CSA-5-0-Download

https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/alerts/2024/09/19/ivanti-releases-admin-bypass-security-update-cloud-services-appliance

##
iulianvostrut@mastodon.social at 2024-09-20T04:29:34.000Z ##

Urgent Alert: Critical Security Flaw (CVE-2024-8963) in Ivanti CSA being actively exploited! Unauthenticated attackers can bypass admin authentication and execute arbitrary commands. Stay vigilant and implement necessary patches immediately to safeguard your systems.

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-19T18:32:43.644Z ##

CISA: Ivanti Releases Admin Bypass Security Update for Cloud Services Appliance
Wow, CISA actually wrote a useful cybersecurity alert. Instead of just saying "Ivanti released a security update, go look at the vendor's advisory," this actually states that the vendor noted limited exploitation of CVE-2024-8963, and that when chained with CVE-2024-8190, an attacker can take control of an affected system. CISA also mentions that CVE-2024-8963 in the KEV Catalog now.

#CVE_2024_8190 #CVE_2024_8963 #Ivanti #zeroday #activeexploitation #cve #vulnerability #CISA #KEV #knownexploitedvulnerabilitiescatalog

##
cisakevtracker@mastodon.social at 2024-09-19T18:00:47.000Z ##

CVE ID: CVE-2024-8963
Vendor: Ivanti
Product: Cloud Services Appliance (CSA)
Date Added: 2024-09-19
Vulnerability: Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance (CSA) Path Traversal Vulnerability
Notes: https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-Ivanti-CSA-4-6-Cloud-Services-Appliance-CVE-2024-8963 ; https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-8963
CVE URL: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-8963

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-19T17:08:42.299Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds One Known Exploited Vulnerability to Catalog (link updated)
HOT OFF THE PRESS! CVE-2024-8963 Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance (CSA) Path Traversal Vulnerability.

#cisa #kev #knownexploitedvulnerability #zeroday #vulnerability #CVE_2024_8963 #activeexploitation #eitw #ivanti #ivanticsa

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-19T16:26:12.067Z ##

Ivanti exploited zero-day: Security Advisory Ivanti CSA 4.6 (Cloud Services Appliance) (CVE-2024-8963)
CVE-2024-8963 (9.4 critical) Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

This was originally reported at least 8 hours ago but Ivanti deleted their blog post and the security advisory required logging in. See parent toot above. Now the information is public.

According to the security advisory, it was chained with CVE-2024-8190 (7.2 high, disclosed 10 September 2024 by Ivanti, added to CISA KEV Catalog 13 September 2024) Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance OS command injection vulnerability so "an attacker can bypass admin authentication and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance."

#Ivanti #vulnerability #ivanticsa #cve #CVE_2024_8963 #zeroday #eitw #activeexploitation

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-19T11:09:20.310Z ##

Ivanti originally published a blog post Cloud Service Appliance 4.6 Security Update which updated the RSS feed. However, they deleted it. 🤔

From what I can infer from the blog post, the vulnerability is an exploited zero-day in Ivanti Cloud Service Appliance 4.6, "which was incidentally resolved in the patch released 10 September." The URL for the now loginwall'ed security advisory shows that the CVE ID is CVE-2024-8963. CVE.org, MITRE and NVD have varying responses for that number from Reserved by CNA to CVE Not Found.

  • We are aware of a limited number of customers who have been exploited by this vulnerability.
  • This vulnerability does not impact any other Ivanti products or solutions.
  • Ivanti CSA 4.6 is end-of-life and Ivanti strongly recommends that customers transition to Ivanti CSA 5.0 as it is supported and is not affected by this vulnerability.

cc: @campuscodi @goatyell

#Ivanti #vulnerability #ivanticsa #cve #CVE_2024_8963

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-19T18:32:43.000Z ##

CISA: Ivanti Releases Admin Bypass Security Update for Cloud Services Appliance
Wow, CISA actually wrote a useful cybersecurity alert. Instead of just saying "Ivanti released a security update, go look at the vendor's advisory," this actually states that the vendor noted limited exploitation of CVE-2024-8963, and that when chained with CVE-2024-8190, an attacker can take control of an affected system. CISA also mentions that CVE-2024-8963 in the KEV Catalog now.

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-19T16:26:12.000Z ##

Ivanti exploited zero-day: Security Advisory Ivanti CSA 4.6 (Cloud Services Appliance) (CVE-2024-8963)
CVE-2024-8963 (9.4 critical) Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

This was originally reported at least 8 hours ago but Ivanti deleted their blog post and the security advisory required logging in. See parent toot above. Now the information is public.

According to the security advisory, it was chained with CVE-2024-8190 (7.2 high, disclosed 10 September 2024 by Ivanti, added to CISA KEV Catalog 13 September 2024) Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance OS command injection vulnerability so "an attacker can bypass admin authentication and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance."

#Ivanti #vulnerability #ivanticsa #cve #CVE_2024_8963 #zeroday #eitw #activeexploitation

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-19T11:09:20.000Z ##

Ivanti originally published a blog post Cloud Service Appliance 4.6 Security Update which updated the RSS feed. However, they deleted it. 🤔

From what I can infer from the blog post, the vulnerability is an exploited zero-day in Ivanti Cloud Service Appliance 4.6, "which was incidentally resolved in the patch released 10 September." The URL for the now loginwall'ed security advisory shows that the CVE ID is CVE-2024-8963. CVE.org, MITRE and NVD have varying responses for that number from Reserved by CNA to CVE Not Found.

  • We are aware of a limited number of customers who have been exploited by this vulnerability.
  • This vulnerability does not impact any other Ivanti products or solutions.
  • Ivanti CSA 4.6 is end-of-life and Ivanti strongly recommends that customers transition to Ivanti CSA 5.0 as it is supported and is not affected by this vulnerability.

cc: @campuscodi @goatyell

#Ivanti #vulnerability #ivanticsa #cve #CVE_2024_8963

##

CVE-2024-7591
(7.2 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.07%

updated 2024-09-19T18:19:12.210000

1 posts

Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Progress LoadMaster allows OS Command Injection.This issue affects: * LoadMaster: 7.2.40.0 and above * ECS: All versions * Multi-Tenancy: 7.1.35.4 and above

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-13T02:55:10.000Z ##

CISA: Vulnerability Summary for the Week of September 2, 2024
Sometimes I check the summary for hidden gems. This time, five of the Mozilla Firefox CVEs are CVSSv3.1: 9.8 critical

  • CVE-2024-8381 type confusion
  • CVE-2024-8384 memory corruption
  • CVE-2024-8385 type confusion
  • CVE-2024-8387 memory corruption
  • CVE-2024-8389 memory corruption

At a glance, they're obviously high severity. It's just that you won't have that sense of urgency at the time of announcement because you didn't see the CVSS score, or understand the impact.

Let's not forget to mention Hall of Shame Progress Software for having LoadMaster vulnerability CVE-2024-7591 with a perfect 10.0 🥳

##

CVE-2024-40865
(5.3 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-19T17:58:37.370000

1 posts

The issue was addressed by suspending Persona when the virtual keyboard is active. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.3. Inputs to the virtual keyboard may be inferred from Persona.

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-13T15:28:26.000Z ##

Here's a fun one: GAZEploit attack
Reference: CVE-2024-40865 (score pending still, assigned 05 September 2024 by Apple) Inputs to the virtual keyboard may be inferred from Persona

Gazeploit is a novel attack that can infer eye-related biometrics from the avatar image to reconstruct text entered via gaze-controlled typing. Or as The Hacker News puts it: Apple Vision Pro Vulnerability Exposed Virtual Keyboard Inputs to Attackers

The GAZEploit attack leverages the vulnerability inherent in gaze-controlled text entry when users share a virtual avatar. Virtual avatars, whether shared through video calls, online meeting apps, live streaming platforms, or potentially malicious websites, pose a significant privacy risk by potentially exposing user information such as login credentials. By remotely capturing and analyzing the virtual avatar video, an attacker can reconstruct the typed keys. Notably, the GAZEploit attack is the first known attack in this domain that exploits leaked gaze information to remotely perform keystroke inference.

#CVE_2024_40865 #Apple #VisionPro #vulnerability #CVE #GAZEploit

##

CVE-2020-0618
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 97.32%

updated 2024-09-19T01:00:03.107000

4 posts

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services when it incorrectly handles page requests, aka 'Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-18T14:09:44.925Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds Five Known Vulnerabilities to Catalog
This is so hot off the press that CISA's press team hasn't created the page yet. 5 are being added to the KEV:

  • CVE-2020-14644 (9.8 critical) Oracle WebLogic Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2022-21445 (9.8 critical) Oracle JDeveloper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2019-1069 (7.8 high) Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
  • CVE-2020-0618 (8.8 high) Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-27348 (9.8 critical) Apache HugeGraph-Server Improper Access Control Vulnerability

#Cisa #KEV #vulnerability #knownexploitedvulnerabilitiescatalog #CVE #eitw #activeexploitation

CVE-2020-14644
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 24.29%

updated 2024-09-19T01:00:03.107000

4 posts

Vulnerability in the Oracle WebLogic Server product of Oracle Fusion Middleware (component: Core). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.1.3.0, 12.2.1.4.0 and 14.1.1.0.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via IIOP, T3 to compromise Oracle WebLogic Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle WebLogic Se

CVE-2014-0497
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 96.67%

updated 2024-09-18T21:32:33

4 posts

Integer underflow in Adobe Flash Player before 11.7.700.261 and 11.8.x through 12.0.x before 12.0.0.44 on Windows and Mac OS X, and before 11.2.202.336 on Linux, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T14:21:39.498Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds Four Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
Hot off the press! CISA added 4 vulnerabilities to the KEV Catalog

  • CVE-2014-0502 (CVSSv2: 10.0 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Double Free Vulnerablity
  • CVE-2013-0648 (CVSSv2: 9.3 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2013-0643 (CVSSv2: 9.3 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Incorrect Default Permissions Vulnerability
  • CVE-2014-0497 (CVSSv2: 10.0 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Integer Underflow Vulnerablity

cc: @ntkramer @hrbrmstr @neurovagrant (KEV RSS feed took 30 minutes to pick it up, CISA took 1 hour to make the page live)

##

CVE-2013-0643
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 25.77%

updated 2024-09-18T21:32:29

4 posts

The Firefox sandbox in Adobe Flash Player before 10.3.183.67 and 11.x before 11.6.602.171 on Windows and Mac OS X, and before 10.3.183.67 and 11.x before 11.2.202.273 on Linux, does not properly restrict privileges, which makes it easier for remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted SWF content, as exploited in the wild in February 2013.

  • CVE-2013-0643 (CVSSv2: 9.3 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Incorrect Default Permissions Vulnerability
  • CVE-2014-0497 (CVSSv2: 10.0 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Integer Underflow Vulnerablity

cc: @ntkramer @hrbrmstr @neurovagrant (KEV RSS feed took 30 minutes to pick it up, CISA took 1 hour to make the page live)

#cisa #kev #vulnerability #eitw #activeexploitation #CVE #knownexploitedvulnerabilitiescatalog

##

CVE-2014-0502
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 41.02%

updated 2024-09-18T21:30:37

4 posts

Double free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 11.7.700.269 and 11.8.x through 12.0.x before 12.0.0.70 on Windows and Mac OS X and before 11.2.202.341 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 4.0.0.1628 on Android, Adobe AIR SDK before 4.0.0.1628, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 4.0.0.1628 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild in February

cisakevtracker@mastodon.social at 2024-09-17T15:00:50.000Z ##

CVE ID: CVE-2014-0502
Vendor: Adobe
Product: Flash Player
Date Added: 2024-09-17
Vulnerability: Adobe Flash Player Double Free Vulnerablity
Notes: https://www.adobe.com/products/flashplayer/end-of-life-alternative.html#eol-alternative-faq ; https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-0502

screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T14:21:39.498Z ##

CISA: CISA Adds Four Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
Hot off the press! CISA added 4 vulnerabilities to the KEV Catalog

  • CVE-2014-0502 (CVSSv2: 10.0 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Double Free Vulnerablity
  • CVE-2013-0648 (CVSSv2: 9.3 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Code Execution Vulnerability
  • CVE-2013-0643 (CVSSv2: 9.3 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Incorrect Default Permissions Vulnerability
  • CVE-2014-0497 (CVSSv2: 10.0 HIGH) Adobe Flash Player Integer Underflow Vulnerablity

##

CVE-2024-8905
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-18T18:31:53

2 posts

Inappropriate implementation in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 129.0.6668.58 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit stack corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T22:02:54.285Z ##

Google Chrome security advisory: Stable Channel Update for Desktop
Chrome 129.0.6668.58 (Linux) and 129.0.6668.58/.59 (Windows and Mac) has 9 security fixes, 6 externally reported.

  1. CVE-2024-8904 (high) Type Confusion in V8.
  2. CVE-2024-8905 (medium) Inappropriate implementation in V8
  3. CVE-2024-8906 (medium) Incorrect security UI in Downloads
  4. CVE-2024-8907 (medium) Insufficient data validation in Omnibox
  5. CVE-2024-8908 (low) Inappropriate implementation in Autofill
  6. CVE-2024-8909 (low) Inappropriate implementation in UI

No mention of exploitation. A mini #PatchTuesday today after seeing VMware and GitLab.

#Google #Chrome #vulnerability #CVE

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-17T22:02:54.000Z ##

##

CVE-2024-37985
(5.9 MEDIUM)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-18T00:31:11

2 posts

Windows Kernel Information Disclosure Vulnerability

screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T22:58:57.847Z ##

Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC) security advisories:

  • CVE-2024-38183 (8.8 high) GroupMe Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-43460 (8.1 high) Dynamics 365 Business Central Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability

These two are not exploited, not publicly disclosed, and exploitation less likely. "This vulnerability has already been fully mitigated by Microsoft. There is no action for users of this service to take. This purpose of this CVE is to provide further transparency."

In other news, MSRC updated CVE-2024-37985 (5.9 medium, disclosed 09 July 2024 by Microsoft as a EDIT: publicly-disclosed* vulnerability) Windows Kernel Information Disclosure Vulnerability. "Updated CNA for this CVE to Microsoft and updated the FAQ. This is an informational update only."

#MSRC #Microsoft #vulnerability #CVE #CVE_2024_38183 #CVE_2024_43460 #CVE_2024_37985

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-17T22:58:57.000Z ##

  • CVE-2024-38183 (8.8 high) GroupMe Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-43460 (8.1 high) Dynamics 365 Business Central Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability

CVE-2024-45695
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.08%

updated 2024-09-17T21:31:32

2 posts

The web service of certain models of D-Link wireless routers contains a Stack-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability, which allows unauthenticated remote attackers to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the device.

1 repos

#search_error

verbrecher@mastodon.social at 2024-09-16T20:36:48.000Z ##

New:

🚨 CVSS 9.8 for D-Link WiFi Routers: Update Your Firmware Immediately

🛡️ Critical vulnerabilities have been discovered in several D-Link router models, potentially exposing millions of users to major security risks. TWCERT/CC, Taiwan's cybersecurity agency, urges all users to update their firmware without delay to avoid remote control of their devices.

Vulns:

CVE-2024-45694 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45698 (CVSS 8.8)
CVE-2024-45697 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45695 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45696 (CVSS 8.8)

##

CVE-2024-38812
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-17T18:33:35

11 posts

The vCenter Server contains a heap-overflow vulnerability in the implementation of the DCERPC protocol. A malicious actor with network access to vCenter Server may trigger this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted network packet potentially leading to remote code execution.

1 repos

#search_error

jos1264@social.skynetcloud.site at 2024-09-18T11:20:02.000Z ##

Critical VMware vCenter Server bugs fixed (CVE-2024-38812) https://www.helpnetsecurity.com/2024/09/18/cve-2024-38812-cve-2024-38813/ #securityupdate #virtualization #vulnerability #Don'tmiss #Hotstuff #Broadcom #VMware #News #CVE

##
benzogaga33@mamot.fr at 2024-09-18T09:40:03.000Z ##

VMware vCenter Server vulnérable à une exécution de code à distance (CVE-2024-38812) https://www.it-connect.fr/vmware-vcenter-server-vulnerable-a-une-execution-de-code-a-distance-cve-2024-38812/ #ActuCybersécurité #Cybersécurité #Vulnérabilité #VMware

##
decio at 2024-09-18T07:19:06.862Z ##

"VMware Patches Remote Code Execution Flaw Found in Chinese Hacking Contest"
⬇️
"The most severe of the two, tagged as CVE-2024-38812 ... VMware warned that an attacker with network access to the server could send a specially crafted packet to execute remote code. The flaw carries a CVSS severity score of 9.8/10."
⬇️
"Chinese law dictates that zero-day vulnerabilities found by citizens must be promptly disclosed to the government. The details of a security hole cannot be sold or provided to any third-party, apart from the product’s manufacturer. The cybersecurity industry has raised concerns that the law will help the Chinese government stockpile zero-days."
👇
https://www.securityweek.com/vmware-patches-remote-code-execution-flaw-found-in-chinese-hacking-contest/
⬇️
🩹
👇
https://support.broadcom.com/web/ecx/support-content-notification/-/external/content/SecurityAdvisories/0/24968

#VMware #CVE_2024_38812 #cyberveille #broadcom #vulnerability

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T19:50:13.723Z ##

Security Week: VMware Patches Remote Code Execution Flaw Found in Chinese Hacking Contest
Security Week links the VMware vCenter vulnerabilities CVE-2024-38812 and CVE-2024-38813 (see parent toot above for the security advisory) to the 2024 Matrix Cup contest. @nattothoughts has thoughts on that: Matrix Cup: Cultivating Top Hacking Talent, Keeping Close Hold on Results

It prioritizes new talent cultivation and expands the access of intelligence agencies to critical vulnerabilities, as the vulnerabilities found in the contest are likely channeled to the Ministry of State Security (MSS) for potential use in offensive operations.

#CVE_2024_38812 #matrixcup #CVE_2024_38813 #vmware #vulnerability #CVE #vCenter

##
screaminggoat at 2024-09-17T19:37:18.279Z ##

VMware security advisory: VMSA-2024-0019

  • CVE-2024-38812 (9.8 critical) VMware vCenter Server heap-overflow vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-38813 (7.5 high) VMware vCenter privilege escalation vulnerability

According to the stupid bit.ly shortened link to the Frequently Asked Questions:

Broadcom is not currently aware of exploitation “in the wild.” If that changes the advisory and this document will be updated. Please subscribe to the VMSA mailing list (link above) for proactive alerts.

Obligatory fuck Broadcom.

#vmware #vcenter #vulnerability #cve #CVE_2024_38812 #CVE_2024_38813

"VMware Patches Remote Code Execution Flaw Found in Chinese Hacking Contest"
⬇️
"The most severe of the two, tagged as CVE-2024-38812 ... VMware warned that an attacker with network access to the server could send a specially crafted packet to execute remote code. The flaw carries a CVSS severity score of 9.8/10."
⬇️
"Chinese law dictates that zero-day vulnerabilities found by citizens must be promptly disclosed to the government. The details of a security hole cannot be sold or provided to any third-party, apart from the product’s manufacturer. The cybersecurity industry has raised concerns that the law will help the Chinese government stockpile zero-days."

  • CVE-2024-38812 (9.8 critical) VMware vCenter Server heap-overflow vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-38813 (7.5 high) VMware vCenter privilege escalation vulnerability

According to the stupid bit.ly shortened link to the Frequently Asked Questions:

Broadcom is not currently aware of exploitation “in the wild.” If that changes the advisory and this document will be updated. Please subscribe to the VMSA mailing list (link above) for proactive alerts.

Obligatory fuck Broadcom.

CVE-2024-38813
(7.5 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.04%

updated 2024-09-17T18:33:26

6 posts

The vCenter Server contains a privilege escalation vulnerability. A malicious actor with network access to vCenter Server may trigger this vulnerability to escalate privileges to root by sending a specially crafted network packet.

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-17T19:50:13.000Z ##

Security Week: VMware Patches Remote Code Execution Flaw Found in Chinese Hacking Contest
Security Week links the VMware vCenter vulnerabilities CVE-2024-38812 and CVE-2024-38813 (see parent toot above for the security advisory) to the 2024 Matrix Cup contest. @nattothoughts has thoughts on that: Matrix Cup: Cultivating Top Hacking Talent, Keeping Close Hold on Results

It prioritizes new talent cultivation and expands the access of intelligence agencies to critical vulnerabilities, as the vulnerabilities found in the contest are likely channeled to the Ministry of State Security (MSS) for potential use in offensive operations.

#CVE_2024_38812 #matrixcup #CVE_2024_38813 #vmware #vulnerability #CVE #vCenter

##
screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-17T19:37:18.000Z ##

VMware security advisory: VMSA-2024-0019

  • CVE-2024-38812 (9.8 critical) VMware vCenter Server heap-overflow vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-38813 (7.5 high) VMware vCenter privilege escalation vulnerability

According to the stupid bit.ly shortened link to the Frequently Asked Questions:

Broadcom is not currently aware of exploitation “in the wild.” If that changes the advisory and this document will be updated. Please subscribe to the VMSA mailing list (link above) for proactive alerts.

Obligatory fuck Broadcom.

#vmware #vcenter #vulnerability #cve #CVE_2024_38812 #CVE_2024_38813

iulianvostrut@mastodon.social at 2024-09-17T09:54:13.000Z ##

Microsoft has confirmed active exploitation of CVE-2024-43461, a critical MSHTML spoofing flaw, leading to the delivery of Atlantida stealer malware. This marks the fourth zero-day patched by Microsoft this month. Stay vigilant and update your systems promptly.

CISA: CISA Adds Two Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
This is so hot off of the press that CISA hasn't started making the CISA alert yet.

  • CVE-2024-43461 (8.8 high, disclosed 10 September 2024 by Microsoft during Patch Tuesday) Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing Vulnerability
  • CVE-2024-6670 (9.8 critical, disclosed 16 August 2024 by Progress Software, has proof of concept) Progress WhatsUp Gold SQL Injection Vulnerability

screaminggoat at 2024-09-14T03:18:28.646Z ##

Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC) corrected CVE-2024-43461 (8.8 high) Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing Vulnerability, marking it as both exploited and publicly disclosed based on evidence of exploitation from ZDI Hunting Team (see parent toot). This is the fifth zero day of September 2024 Patch Tuesday!

##

CVE-2024-45696
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.05%

updated 2024-09-16T14:52:40

2 posts

Certain models of D-Link wireless routers contain hidden functionality. By sending specific packets to the web service, the attacker can forcibly enable the telnet service and log in using hard-coded credentials. The telnet service enabled through this method can only be accessed from within the same local network as the device.

1 repos

#search_error

verbrecher@mastodon.social at 2024-09-16T20:36:48.000Z ##

New:

🚨 CVSS 9.8 for D-Link WiFi Routers: Update Your Firmware Immediately

🛡️ Critical vulnerabilities have been discovered in several D-Link router models, potentially exposing millions of users to major security risks. TWCERT/CC, Taiwan's cybersecurity agency, urges all users to update their firmware without delay to avoid remote control of their devices.

Vulns:

CVE-2024-45694 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45698 (CVSS 8.8)
CVE-2024-45697 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45695 (CVSS 9.8)
CVE-2024-45696 (CVSS 8.8)

##

CVE-2024-45694
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.08%

updated 2024-09-16T14:52:40

2 posts

The web service of certain models of D-Link wireless routers contains a Stack-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability, which allows unauthenticated remote attackers to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the device.

CVE-2024-45697
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.08%

updated 2024-09-16T14:52:37

2 posts

Certain models of D-Link wireless routers have a hidden functionality where the telnet service is enabled when the WAN port is plugged in. Unauthorized remote attackers can log in and execute OS commands using hard-coded credentials.

CVE-2024-8695
(9.8 CRITICAL)

EPSS: 0.09%

updated 2024-09-13T16:01:31.340000

2 posts

A remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability via crafted extension description/changelog could be abused by a malicious extension in Docker Desktop before 4.34.2.

screaminggoat at 2024-09-20T00:00:31.059Z ##

Docker security advisory: Docker Desktop release notes 4.34.2

  • CVE-2024-8695 (9.0 critical) RCE via crafted extension description/changelog
  • CVE-2024-8696 (8.9 high) RCE via crafted extension publisher-url/additional-urls

Disclosed 12 September 2024, I figure someone would be worried about it. No mention of exploitation.

#docker #vulnerability #CVE

CVE-2024-8638
(8.8 HIGH)

EPSS: 0.06%

updated 2024-09-13T15:32:38

1 posts

Type Confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 128.0.6613.137 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit object corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

1 repos

#search_error

screaminggoat@infosec.exchange at 2024-09-13T02:13:12.000Z ##

I have to issue a correction: The Microsoft Edge team routinely patches against identified vulnerabilities and I mistakenly said that the 11 September 2024 security advisories were for Google Chrome's Tuesday blog post CVE IDs. Well those dropped today so let me identify which was for which:

  • CVE-2024-7970 and CVE-2024-8362 came from 02 September 2024 Google Chrome blog post.
  • CVE-2024-8194 and CVE-2024-8198 are from the 28 August 2024 Google Chrome blog post.
  • CVE-2024-38222 (6.5 medium) Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) Information Disclosure Vulnerability was brand new.

So today's are for the 10 September 2024 Patch Tuesday Google Chrome blog post (see parent toot above):

  • CVE-2024-8639 Use after free in Autofill
  • CVE-2024-8638 Type Confusion in V8
  • CVE-2024-8637 Use after free in Media Router
  • CVE-2024-8636 Heap buffer overflow in Skia
##

  • CVE-2024-8194 and CVE-2024-8198 are from the 28 August 2024 Google Chrome blog post.
